settings.heading: FORGE 4.0 Documentation
settings.subheading: Everything you need to know to get the most out of your theme

settings.title: Introduction
settings.content:
Welcome to FORGE 4.0, the Shopify theme designed for professionals who need power, flexibility, and performance without the overhead of third-party apps.

Why FORGE?

FORGE replaces $150-400/month in third-party apps with built-in features:

  • Mega Menu - Advanced navigation with images, videos, and multi-column layouts
  • Loyalty Engine - Points system, referrals, and VIP tiers
  • SEO Suite - Structured data, meta optimization, and performance tuning
  • Progressive Web App - Offline support and app-like experience
  • AI Search & Chat - Intelligent product discovery
  • Video Gallery - YouTube, Vimeo, and self-hosted video support
  • Advanced FAQ - Searchable, categorized FAQ with schema markup

Who is FORGE for?

FORGE is built for industrial suppliers, B2B merchants, equipment dealers, and any business that needs professional-grade features without app subscriptions.

settings.title: Installation
settings.content:
Installing FORGE is straightforward through the Shopify Theme Store.

Step 1: Purchase & Download

After purchasing FORGE from the Theme Store, it will automatically be added to your theme library.

Step 2: Customize

Navigate to Online Store → Themes in your Shopify admin. Click Customize on FORGE to open the theme editor.

Step 3: Choose a Preset

FORGE includes 11 pre-designed presets for different industries and aesthetics. Select one from Theme settings → Presets to get started quickly.

Step 4: Add Your Content

Replace placeholder content with your own:

  • Upload your logo in Header settings
  • Add products to collections
  • Customize homepage sections
  • Set up navigation menus

Step 5: Publish

When you're ready, click Publish to make FORGE your live theme.

settings.title: Theme Presets
settings.content:
FORGE includes 11 professionally designed presets, each with its own color palette, typography, and layout configurations.

Industrial Presets

  • The Welder - Bold red accent, rugged industrial feel
  • Work Zone - Safety orange, construction-ready
  • Site Ops - Caution yellow, high visibility
  • Midnight Shift - Dark mode, late-night operations
  • Precision - Professional blue, engineering focus
  • Tactical - Military green, outdoor equipment
  • Monolith - Pure black, minimal and bold

Lifestyle Presets

  • Modern Minimal - Clean, sophisticated aesthetics
  • Bold Impact - High contrast, attention-grabbing
  • Warm Artisan - Handcrafted, artisanal feel
  • Tech Forward - Futuristic, innovation-focused

Switching Presets

To change presets, go to Theme settings → Presets and select your desired style. All colors, fonts, and spacing will update automatically.

settings.title: Mega Menu
settings.content:
The FORGE Mega Menu transforms your navigation into a powerful discovery tool.

Features

  • Multi-column dropdown layouts
  • Featured images and promotional banners
  • Video integration
  • Collection showcases
  • Quick links and CTAs

Setting Up

  1. Navigate to Header → Mega Menu in the theme editor
  2. Create menu items and assign dropdown types
  3. Add images, links, and featured content
  4. Configure column layouts and widths

Best Practices

  • Limit top-level items to 5-7 for clarity
  • Use images to highlight key categories
  • Include seasonal promotions in featured areas
  • Test on mobile to ensure usability

settings.title: Loyalty Engine
settings.content:
Built-in customer loyalty without expensive apps. Reward your customers and increase retention.

Points System

Customers earn points for:

  • Making purchases (configurable points per dollar)
  • Creating an account
  • Writing product reviews
  • Social media follows
  • Referrals

VIP Tiers

Create tiered loyalty levels with increasing benefits:

  • Bronze - Entry level, basic rewards
  • Silver - 1.5x point multiplier
  • Gold - 2x points, exclusive products
  • Platinum - 3x points, priority support, free shipping

Referral Program

Enable word-of-mouth marketing with built-in referral tracking. Customers share unique links and earn rewards when friends make purchases.

Configuration

Access loyalty settings in Theme settings → Loyalty. Configure point values, tier thresholds, and reward options.

settings.title: SEO Tools
settings.content:
FORGE includes comprehensive SEO optimization built into every page.

Structured Data

Automatic JSON-LD schema markup for:

  • Organization - Business information for knowledge panels
  • Product - Rich snippets with price, availability, reviews
  • BreadcrumbList - Navigation path in search results
  • FAQPage - FAQ rich results
  • VideoObject - Video thumbnails in search

Performance Optimization

  • Critical CSS inlining for faster first paint
  • Lazy loading for images and videos
  • Preconnect to external resources
  • Efficient JavaScript loading

Meta Tag Management

Control meta titles, descriptions, and social sharing images for all pages through the theme editor.

settings.title: PWA Support
settings.content:
FORGE is a Progressive Web App, providing an app-like experience for your customers.

Features

  • Offline Mode - Core pages available without internet
  • Add to Home Screen - Install as a mobile app
  • Fast Loading - Service worker caching
  • Push Notifications - Re-engage customers (requires setup)

Enabling PWA

PWA features are enabled by default. Configure the app manifest in Theme settings → PWA:

  • App name and short name
  • Theme color and background color
  • App icons (multiple sizes)
  • Display mode (standalone, fullscreen, etc.)

Testing

Use Chrome DevTools → Application → Manifest to verify your PWA configuration. The Lighthouse audit can also assess PWA readiness.

settings.title: Theme Settings
settings.content:
Access global theme settings through Online Store → Themes → Customize → Theme settings.

Available Settings

  • Colors - Primary, secondary, accent, and background colors
  • Typography - Heading and body font families, sizes, weights
  • Layout - Container width, section spacing, grid gaps
  • Buttons - Border radius, padding, hover effects
  • Cards - Shadows, borders, corner radius
  • Header - Logo, navigation style, sticky behavior
  • Footer - Columns, newsletter, social links
  • Cart - Drawer vs page, upsells, notes
  • Product - Gallery style, variant display, add to cart
  • Collection - Grid layout, filters, sorting

Design Tokens

FORGE uses CSS custom properties for consistent styling. All colors, fonts, and spacing reference these tokens, making customization predictable.

settings.title: Sections & Blocks
settings.content:
FORGE includes 70+ sections for building any page layout.

Section Categories

  • Hero - Banner, slideshow, video hero, split hero
  • Products - Featured collection, product grid, recently viewed
  • Content - Rich text, image with text, multicolumn
  • Media - Image gallery, video gallery, before/after
  • Trust - Testimonials, reviews, trust badges, stats
  • Conversion - CTA banners, newsletter, countdown
  • Navigation - Mega menu, side menu, breadcrumbs
  • FAQ - Accordion FAQ, searchable FAQ

Using Blocks

Many sections support blocks for flexible content. Click Add block within a section to add content units like:

  • Headings and text
  • Buttons and links
  • Images and icons
  • Product cards
  • Custom HTML

settings.title: Custom Code
settings.content:
Add custom CSS and JavaScript to extend FORGE functionality.

Custom CSS

Add custom styles in Theme settings → Custom CSS. Use CSS custom properties for consistency:

.my-custom-element {
  color: var(--color-primary);
  font-family: var(--font-heading-family);
  padding: var(--spacing-sections);
}

Custom JavaScript

Add scripts in Theme settings → Custom JavaScript. FORGE utilities are available:

// Debounce function
Utils.debounce(callback, delay);

// Fetch JSON data
Utils.fetchJSON(url);

// Trap focus in modal
Utils.trapFocus(element);

Best Practices

  • Test custom code thoroughly before publishing
  • Use browser DevTools to debug issues
  • Avoid overriding core theme styles when possible
  • Document your customizations for future reference

settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.content:
How do I update FORGE?

Theme updates are delivered through the Shopify Theme Store. Check for updates in your theme library and apply them when available. Your customizations will be preserved.

Can I use FORGE on multiple stores?

Each FORGE license is valid for one store. Contact support for multi-store licensing options.

Is FORGE mobile-responsive?

Yes, FORGE is fully responsive and optimized for all device sizes. We use container queries for precise component adaptation.

How do I get support?

Submit support requests through the Shopify Theme Store. Include your store URL, browser information, and detailed description of your issue.

Can I customize the code?

Yes, FORGE is built with clean, documented code. You can modify Liquid templates, CSS, and JavaScript. We recommend duplicating the theme before making code changes.

Does FORGE work with Shopify Markets?

Yes, FORGE fully supports Shopify Markets for international selling, including currency conversion, language translation, and regional customization.
